授業目的:
The purpose of this course is to help students improve their overall writing skills in English. Students will learn to follow a process to improve their writing skills. This process includes three key steps – Prewriting, Writing, and Revising. Students will learn about and be able to practice each step.
Course content will help students understand different writing styles, such as formal and informal. Students will learn to write for a variety of purposes, including academic and practical. There will be a focus on understanding the organization and parts of written work. Writing activities will also help students improve their critical thinking skills. Students will be able to work with and help their classmates. The main writing task in semester one will be to write a formal email.
到達目標:
• Students will improve their overall writing skills in English.
• Students will learn to use a writing process to improve their writing skills. This includes three steps: Prewriting / Writing / Revising.
• Students will learn about different parts of written work. This includes understanding and writing: Topic sentences / Supporting sentences / Concluding sentences.
• Students will learn to organize and write their ideas in different ways.
• Students will learn to edit their own and others’ written work.
• Students will improve their grammar and punctuation in writing.
• Students will learn about different organizing elements in writing, such as using signal words and phrases.
• Students will learn about different kinds of writing. For example, writing descriptions, comparisons, and opinions.
• Students will learn to write informal emails and formal business emails.
• Students will learn writing skills for a variety of purposes, including practical, academic, and professional purposes.
• Students will improve their ability to work independently (alone) and cooperatively (with others).
• Students will improve their cultural understanding.
• To have a comfortable classroom atmosphere that helps learning and cooperation.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Most course content will be delivered using a process approach to teaching writing. Students will be required to complete activities individually with some opportunities for collaboration and cooperative learning. Students will be required to complete a minimum of one hour of course work outside of class time, on their own, as asigned by the instructor. This work will include completing textbook work and writing assignments, preparing for class by reviewing and previewing course content, and keeping a "Writing Journal."
